recipe.title: Red Pepper Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1/4 cup finely chopped yellow bell pepper
1/4 cup finely chopped red bell pepper
instructions: In a small bowl whisk together vinegar and salt and pepper to taste. Add oil in a stream, whisking, and whisk until emulsified. Stir in bell peppers. Vinaigrette may be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered. Bring vinaigrette to room temperature and whisk before proceeding with recipe.
